[/quote]
i get only 6 errors rotfl[/quote]

Yeah but see my server is alot more editted then yours so it has conflict issues with some of the other shit I have. K?

item.title: Real magic on players (includes my ancient magicks code)
item.dc:creator: @xerozcheez xerozcheez
item.description:
@xerozcheez wrote:

Hmm, if it says illegal start of expression then you probably put something in the wrong place or a bracket is missing, I’m sorry it’s pretty hard to follow, I’ll post the proper voids, but it’ll still be hard because my source is mostly whitescape but has a bit of mythscape and scaperune, and then lots of my own coding (I’ve added about 10,000 lines of code, alot of it my coding lol and I’ve edited alot of the way things work), so you’re gonna have to implement it =[br][size=1]Posted at: April 02, 2006, 12:52:34 pm[/size][hr]Voids:

[code]public void inCombat()
{
LogoutDelay = 60;
}
public void entangle()
{
EntangleDelay = 20;
}
public void uberentangle()
{
EntangleDelay = 40;
}
public void Poison() {
//if(Poisoned = false)
{
if(PoisonDelay <= 1)
{
hitDiff = 3 + misc.random(20);
sendMessage(“You start to die of poison”);
PoisonDelay = 40;
playerLevel[3] -= hitDiff;
updateRequired = true;
hitUpdateRequired = true;
inCombat();
}
if(playerLevel[3] < 1)
{
playerLevel[3] = 0;
}
if(playerLevel[3] == 0)
{
for(int r=0; r<playerEquipment.length; r++) {
try {
int item = playerEquipment[r];
if((item > 0) && (item < 10000)) {
remove(item, r);
}
} catch(Exception e) { sendMessage(“ERROR: Removing Equipment”); }
}
for(int rr=0; rr<playerItems.length; rr++) {
try {
if(playerItems[rr] > 0 && playerItems[rr] < 10000) {
deleteItem(playerItems[rr]-1, getItemSlot(playerItems[rr]-1), 1);
}
} catch(Exception e) { }
}
removeAllItems();
teleportToX = 3254;
teleportToY = 3420;
//pEmote = 15;
//pWalk = 13;
sendMessage(“Oh dear you are dead!”);
PoisonDelay = 9999999;
setSkillLevel(3, 99, playerLevel[3]);
currentHealth = 99;
hitDiff = 0;
updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
}
}

public void PoisonPlayer()
{
Poisoned = false;
PoisonClear = 0;
PoisonDelay = 40;
Poison = 1;
Poison();
}
[/code]

Intergers:

public int LogoutDelay = 0;
public int EntangleDelay = 0;
public int PkingDelay = 0;
public int PoisonDelay = 9999999;
public int PoisonClear = 0;
public int Poison = 0;

Booleans:

Poisoned = false;

Then in process() add…

LogoutDelay -= 1;
EntangleDelay -= 1;
PkingDelay -= 1;
PoisonDelay -= 1;
Poison();

Then in case 9154 (logout case), make it look like this:

case 9154: //Log out
if (LogoutDelay >= 0)
{
sendMessage("You have to wait 30 seconds out of being in combat to logout.");
}
else
{
logout();
}
break;

And that’s it, I left out the walking things because for some reason my server doesn’t have em lol, must of forget to add it when transferring to whitescape, but if you’re a fairly good coder you should be able to do it.

[quote=“llamamastafu, post:18, topic:695”]this dont work…

and if i add i move the voids, i get like 37 errors, and nobody will help me. this is bullshit[/quote]
